thread.title: Happy Customer!
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Happy Customer!

author: Happy Customer!
title: Happy Customer!
text: I've been going to R&G Brenner for years now and I've always had a pleasant experience. I'm always able to get an appointment quickly that fits into my schedule. The person who prepares my taxes is very nice and takes her time to make sure I get back the most I possibly can. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because every year, for no apparent reason, the price goes up.
